creates.description: a filename, when it already exists, this step will B(not) be run.

executable.description: change the shell used to execute the command. Should be an absolute path to the executable.

chdir.description: cd into this directory before running the command

removes.description: a filename, when it does not exist, this step will B(not) be run.

warn.description: if command warnings are on in ansible.cfg, do not warn about this particular line if set to no/false.

free_form.description: The shell module takes a free form command to run, as a string.  There's not an actual option named "free form".  See the examples!
